tool.name: SAGA.grid_analysis.14
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySAND False isArraySILT False isArrayCLAY False isArrayUSER False output_data_TEXTURE $output_data_TEXTURE output_data_SUM $output_data_SUM output_data_POLYGONS $output_data_POLYGONS name SAGA.grid_analysis.14 SAND $SAND SILT $SILT CLAY $CLAY SCHEME $SCHEME COLORS $COLORS USER $USER XY_AXES $XY_AXES TRIANGLE $TRIANGLE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TEXTURE $OutputSection_TEXTURE.outputType_TEXTURE transmissionMode_TEXTURE $OutputSection_TEXTURE.transmissionMode_TEXTURE outputType_SUM $OutputSection_SUM.outputType_SUM transmissionMode_SUM $OutputSection_SUM.transmissionMode_SUM outputType_POLYGONS $OutputSection_POLYGONS.outputType_POLYGONS transmissionMode_POLYGONS $OutputSection_POLYGONS.transmissionMode_POLYGONS

param.name: SAND
param.label: Sand
param.help: sand content given as percentage The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: SILT
param.label: Silt
param.help: silt content given as percentage The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: CLAY
param.label: Clay
param.help: clay content given as percentage The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: USER
param.label: User Definition
param.help: The colour is defined as comma separated red, green and blue values (in the range 0 to 255). If the colour field is empty it will be generated from the chosen default colour scheme. Key and name are simple text labels specifying each class. The polygon is defined as pairs of sand (=x) and clay (=y) separated by a blank and separated from the next pair by a comma. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TEXTURE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TEXTURE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_SUM
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SUM
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_POLYGONS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_POLYGONS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Derive soil texture classes from sand, silt and clay contents. Currently supported schemes are USDA and German Kartieranleitung 5.
